comments.text:
Ciao ragazzi!! Spero tantissimo che leggiate questo messaggio e che magari 
mi rispondiate. Dunque oggi io e mia cugina abbiamo incontrato Mirko 
(perdonami se si scrive senza k) ci siamo fatti una foto insieme e abbiamo 
parlato un paio di minuti. Ecco quei minuti anche se pochissimi mi sono 
bastati per capire che siete ragazzi oltre che simpatici, genuini e 
gentili, per niente montati o "esaltati". Quindi davvero vi ringrazio tanto 
tanto perché mi fate ridere da morire e rallegrate le mie giornate più 
tristi... e tutto questo senza essere minimamente staccati dalla realtà. 
Tante grazie a tutti quanti, davvero!!! Detto di cuore♥♥♥

comments.text:
Sarebbe l'allenatore delle nazionali di calcio. Ad esempio: Prandelli era 
il commissario tecnico dell'Italia. Se avesse allenato una squadra di club, 
ad esempio la Juventus, in questo caso viene chiamato allenatore e non 
commissario tecnico.

captions.text: -So, who's going to be the goalkeeper?
-I'm out...you know I just got surgery on my wrist
-Step back!! Step back...here you go, go shave yourself
-C'mon, we're here to have fun! C'mon! We're here to enjoy ourselves, get up
-"Love, come see me playing"...I'm surrounded by mosquitoes
-I warn you guys, I'm back on the field after one year and a half and my ligaments don't work very well
-"C'mon love! There's going to be other girls"...sure
-Someone has a pair of underwear I can borrow?
-Can I borrow your flip flops? You know, I need to shower
-Oh thanks...why do you have a hair dryer anyway?
-He did not score even one goal and then he comes to me and ask "was I good?" "Oh yeah you were awesome"
-Does it hurt if I touch here?
-Gabry...you have one month left to live
-Give it to me! I'm free! C'mon give to me! Give it to me! Give it to me!
-Give it to me! I'm free, give it to me! Give it to me!
-You never give it to me, I didn't expect it
-C'mon, keep running! It's just 55 minutes left to play
-Okay guys, I finally found the 10th man! But he's not so...good
-Excuse him guys, it's not his fault it's the first time for him
-Follow him! Follow him!! What are you doing?? I can play better...unfortunately I can't right now
-C'mon! My grandma would have done better
-Why are you pointing that gun to me...? Why are...my grandma points it better!
-You told me Gabriele was not so good...he's saving every action
-Look! He saved a baby now...where did he find a baby anyway?
-C'mon guys, teams are balanced...maybe later we can mix the players
-What? Are you kidding me? They're old, we are faster than them
-Trap of the offside, trap of the offside!
-You can move the horse!! You can move the horse!
-What do you mean Gabriel Garko got married?
-Does anyone know when "Game of Thrones" new series starts?
-Love, did you see the goal I made for you?
-Yes, the one you did jumping in the hair
-No? It was not you than...what a shame...
-What's the name of the guy who did that?
-You're going to wear the pink uniform because he already has a pink shirt so...
-When you a good goalkeeper, you can't lose

title: CHI INCONTRI QUANDO GIOCHI A CALCETTO? - NIRKIOP
